Many times when I tried to access my web pages I will get the following series

servlet engine. Right now our project is in testing mode. 

I observed this exception will occur when user clicked various pages one by one 
immediately. Is is smething becasue of poor request handling when user hits on 
multiple pages simulatelously (randomly)

Regards
Suraj

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
What version of the VM are you running?  This looks like a VM problem more than 
a Tomcat problem.

creator: bojan@binarix.com
text:
This looks like a VM bug, since pure Java code cannot cause this behaviour
unless VM, libraries it uses or the OS has bugs.

You should:

- investigate any known bugs of the VM and available patches
- report the problem to the VM vendor
- switch to another VM
